class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        m = defaultdict(int)
        n = len(nums)
        v = []
        
        for i in range(n//2):
            m[abs(nums[i] - nums[n-i-1])] += 1
            ma = 0
            ma = max(ma, max(nums[i], nums[n-i-1]))
            ma = max(ma, max(k - nums[i], k - nums[n-i-1]))
            v.append(ma)
        v.sort()
        ans = float('inf')
        for diff, count in m.items():
            i = bisect.bisect_left(v, diff)
            num = i * 2 + n // 2 - i - count
            ans = min(ans, num)
        return ans
